attributes.action: Reduce fuel duty for public transport providers to ensure cheaper public transport for the public
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My petition is for the government to reduce the duty for public transport providers - buses and trains etc, so that the public can experience cheaper public transport, therefor making it more attractive to use public transport over private vehicles.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
